question: Interestingly, if you run the program it always starts with span 3. Why is this the case?

answers.answer: The trials are skipped because of the Run-If settings
The trial is run but none of the visible components within the trial is run in this case, due to the Run-If settings
answers.feedback: Correct! Check the conditionals in the Run-If settings of the trial sequence. The objects Seq0, blank, Seq1, blank, Dot, Recall, Answer, Logger, Next, SPACEBAR and its subsequent blank are only run if the value of Num2 is not 7.
